items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.name: Heartbound Loop
implicitMods: Adds 9 to 14 Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
explicitMods: Minions have 10% increased Area of Effect
420 Physical Damage taken on Minion Death
flavourText: When the axe finally fell, Seryl shared his pain,
and the last thought that flickered through his
fading mind was her broken, shattered scream.

items.name: Bottled Faith
enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect
explicitMods: Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius
Consecrated Ground created during Effect applies 8% increased Damage taken to Enemies
104% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A tourniquet for the soul, squeezing ethereal into physical.

items.name: Death Salvation
enchantMods: Ice Spear fires an additional Projectile
implicitMods: 8% of Physical Damage taken Recouped as Life

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 72 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 3580 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Places a Sigil on the ground, which grants a buff to you and allies in the area around it for a duration. The Sigil gains stages as you spend mana in its area, making the buff more powerful. You can only have one Sigil of Power at a time.
explicitMods: Gains a Stage when you Spend a total of 400 Mana while in Area
10% reduced Mana Cost of your Skills while in Area
Enemies in Area deal 19% less Damage while at maximum Stages
Buff grants 7 to 141 Added Lightning Damage per Stage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 41% increased Damage from Projectile Hits
Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 5 additional targets
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Engulfs you in magical fire that rapidly burns you and nearby enemies. Your spell damage is substantially increased while under this effect. The effect ends when you have 1 life remaining.
explicitMods: Deals 2447.9 Base Fire Damage per second
Deals 35% of your Maximum Life as Base Fire Damage per second
Deals 35% of your Maximum Energy Shield as Base Fire Damage per second
You Burn for 90% of your Maximum Life per second as Fire Damage
You Burn for 70% of your Maximum Energy Shield per second as Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Victory Strike
explicitMods:
Triggers Level 20 Spectral Spirits when Equipped
+3 to maximum number of Spectral Spirits

items.name: The Annihilating Light
implicitMods: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
explicitMods: Deal Triple Damage with Elemental Skills
flavourText: There is no force more destructive in the heavens
than the scintillating light of utter clarity.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their cold resistance and giving them a chance to be frozen when hit.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -36% to Cold Resistance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +25% chance to Freeze
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that can chill enemies or create chilling areas.
explicitMods: 54% increased Effect of Chill inflicted with Supported Skills
Enemies Chilled by Supported Skills increase Cold Damage taken by Chill Effect
Enemies in Chilling Areas from Supported Skills increase Cold Damage taken by Chill Effect
Supported Skills deal 14% more Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fire an icy projectile that bursts on impact or when reaching the targeted area, dealing area damage and creating a chilling area that deals cold damage over time. This area will creep across the ground towards nearby enemies until its duration expires.
explicitMods: Deals 2568.3 Base Cold Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
Can have up to 10 Chilling Areas
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: An icy projectile which has a chance to freeze enemies it passes through. The projectile fades quickly, reducing damage and freezing chance until it dissipates.
explicitMods:
Projectiles continuously lose Damage, up to 50% less Damage by the time they dissipate
Projectiles have 25% chance to Freeze, which is lost over the first quarter of their flight
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

implicitMods: Inflict Cold Exposure on Hit, applying -11% to Cold Resistance
15% chance to Unnerve Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that reserve life or mana to create auras around you.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 20% reduced Area of Effect
Supported Skills have 19% increased Aura effect
Non-Curse Auras from Supported Skills have 10% increased Effect

Supported Skills also count as Blessing Skills
You can only have one Aura on you from your Blessing Skills
Your Non-Blessing Skills which Reserve Mana are Disabled while you have an Aura from a Supported Skill on you

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
